title: Growing concerns over Facebook's hate speech ban
text: RNC Committeewoman Harmeet Dhillon on Facebook's efforts to ban what it considers hate speech.

title: Facebook’s Cryptocoin: Where Do We Sign Up?
text: One thing to say for Facebook Inc. (NASDAQ: FB): the company thinks inside the box.

title: When it comes to elections, Facebook moves slow, may still break things
text: This week, Facebook invited a small group of journalists — which didn’t include TechCrunch — to look at the “war room” it has set up in Dublin, Ireland, to help monitor its products for election-related content that violates its policies. (“Time and space constraints” limited the numbers, a spokesperson told us when he asked why […]

title: Facebook launches its first major ad campaign under new CMO Antonio Lucio, and it's all about Groups
text: The new campaign promotes Facebook Groups, which will feature prominently in the new version of the Facebook app.

title: WaPo: Facebook Open To Working With Regulators To Increase Oversight Of Privacy Practices
text: Facebook Inc. informed the U.S. government it will submit to greater oversight of its data-collection practices after a probe into a series of privacy abuses last year, according to The Washington Post.

title: WSJ: Facebook Looking To Make Cryptocurrency Push
text: Facebook, Inc. has ambitious plans to build out a cryptocurrency-supported payment system and is reaching out to dozens of financial firms and merchants, The Wall Street Journal reported.

title: Too much regulation will hand tech leadership to China, says former Facebook board member
text: Former Facebook board member Donald Graham says too much regulation of American tech firms will elevate Chinese companies.

title: Reddit Co-founder Alexis Ohanian on Facebook, IPOs and more
text: Alexis Ohanian, co-founder of Reddit and Initialized Capital, joins "Squawk Box" at Berkshire Hathaway's annual investor meeting to discuss a wide range of topics including Facebook's new policy to ban public figures that it says "promote or engage in violence and hate.

title: Facebook is creating a cryptocurrency payments system
text: Will social-media users draw a red line with Mark Zuckerberg’s financial-services ambitions?
